text: Philip John Neville (born 21 January 1977) is an English football manager and former professional footballer player. He currently manages Portland Timbers. His brother Gary Neville is also a former professional footballer. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League FA Cup League Cup Europe
